# How can we measure and perceive things that are causally important but mathematically difficult to quantify, such as love, trust, meaning, and purpose?

## Category

- [[Epistemology]]

## Status

Open

## Description

Critical limitation in organizational decision-making that prevents perception of crucial but externalized factors
